title: Poland proposes €2.4 billion in health cuts, risking domestic drug production firestorm
description: Proposed medicine cuts could threaten Poland's economy and security, drugmakers warn
content:
Poland is facing a major political storm after the health ministry’s proposed 2.4 billion budget cuts were leaked.
The government is seeking funds to plug a 5.4 billion hole in the National Health F… [+3760 chars]
